plot: After a horrifying discovery leaves Nick stunned, he is determined to get revenge.

Having had his mother's severed head delivered at home, Nick is out on revenge, even Renard can hardly control his blood-thirst. However it's taken from his home by Hundjäger who kidnap Trubel but knock him out, and his only suspect is FBI agent Chavez. Feral king Frederick is delighted to collect princess Diana, whose magical powers grow as fast as she, however not grateful enough to protect prince Kenneth, who ends up arrested, abducted and forced to duel with Nick, afterward serving as scapegoat for the Ripper murders. The king escapes by helicopter with Juliette and Diana, but is in for a grim surprise too.—KGF Vissers
